titles.title: Foundation of the Federal Bar Association Charter Amendments Act of 2025
Foundation of the Federal Bar Association Charter Amendments Act of 2025
Foundation of the Federal Bar Association Charter Amendments Act of 2025
A bill to amend title 36, United States Code, to revise the Federal charter for the Foundation of the Federal Bar Association.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
